sentences.english: I have an inspector and two officers waiting at the front door .
sentences.chinese: 我已派了一個巡官和兩個警官守候在前門那裏。

sentences.english: He enjoys pretending to be you, Sergeant.
sentences.chinese: 警官，他崇拜你，很喜歡學你。
警官，我的車後部被撞了。

sentences.english: The flexible Red Knife allows officers to rehearse responses to edged weapon attacks.
sentences.chinese: 柔性紅刀可訓練警官模仿在銳器襲擊時反應。

sentences.english: He breezed up to the police officer and asked for directions.
sentences.chinese: 他信步走到警官跟前問路。

sentences.english: Using a gun is one of the students' specialities.
sentences.chinese: 用槍，是警官學校特殊的重頭戲之一。

sentences.english: It was probably the commissary of police who was making the legal summons at the other end of the street.
sentences.chinese: 也許是那警官在街的另一頭，做他的例行勸降工作。

sentences.english: The officer allowed no soldiers to take any excuse for not carrying out his orders.
sentences.chinese: 警官不許可兵士爲不執行他地號令找任何捏詞。

sentences.english: And I told this to Sergeant Crowley.
sentences.chinese: 我向克羅利警官也是這樣說的。

sentences.english: Kelly in front of the camera, playing for a cooling-off police officers or psychiatrists.
sentences.chinese: 陳慧琳在鏡頭前，適合扮演冷靜警官或心理醫生。

sentences.english: Xianfeng : Serve people with heart and soul, we need these officials.
sentences.chinese: 用心和靈魂服務人民，我們需要這樣的警官。

sentences.english: Then military helicopters will be sent to Cairo, Mubarak Police Academy for trial.
sentences.chinese: 隨後軍用直升機將把穆巴拉克送至開羅警官學院受審。

sentences.english: Paiko summoned up some courage and smiled at the Sergeant.
sentences.chinese: Paiko鼓起來一點勇氣，對着警官笑了一下。

sentences.english: Mr Darwin was working as a prison officer at Holme House Prison in Stockton at the time.
sentences.chinese: 失蹤前達爾文是斯托克頓市哈姆休斯監獄的一名警官。

sentences.english: In criminal cases, the most common witnesses are police officers and eyewitnesses.
sentences.chinese: 在刑事案件中，最常見的證人是警官和目擊者。

definition: abbr. for 刑事警察[xing2 shi4 jing3 cha2]/criminal police
police department/police station/abbr. of 警察局
police station (abbr. for 警察署[jing3 cha2 shu3])
SWAT (Special Weapons And Tactics)/riot police/abbr. for 特種警察|特种警察[te4 zhong3 jing3 cha2]
public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
civil police/PRC police/abbr. for 人民警察
